My first opportunity in the market came in when I was finishing my Bachelor's in Computer Engineering at the University of Rio de Janeiro State, in Brazil, in the middle of 2019, starting as a Front End Web Developer for a Vtex Ecommerce, using JavaSript, JQuery and CSS Flex/Grid box. Since then, I've been impproving my skills with the most used tools for web development nowadays, such as ReactJS,GatsbyJS (which is used on this site) and NodeJS, for example.

My Skills and Experiences

I strongly consider myself as independent and self-taught. Like stated above, my first experience in the market was as a Web Developer for a Vtex Ecommerce in Brazil, CCM Gym Deluxe. In the past, I've done lots of solo projects and freelancing since 2016, even using Java, PHP, MySQL and lots of Python. My next stage of experience was here, in Barrie - ON, where I live now, as a Junior Web Developer for Marketplace Solutions, building ReactJS pages with GatsbyJS and GraphQL. I also have a good experience with SQL language, as I've done quite a lot of work at University with MySQL and PHP. Nowadays I'm looking for opportunities of putting in practice all my data analysis skills alogn with my Python Machine Learning and data manipulation skills.

This is just the beginning

Of course, there is still much to learn. Make sure you've already checked all my works here on this website, to see what we can achieve working together. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out for me clicking on my social media links at the bottom of the page.

What comes next?

In January 2020, I joined Canada to study Big Data Analytics, a post-graduation program, at Georgian College in Barrie - Ontario, so I can expand my possibilities in this wide field of technology. The next step is to actively pursue an opportunity for me to put all my knowledge into producing results for whoever trust my potential. And of course, we are all eternal learners and so am I, I'll always keep studying to expand my knowledge and skills to keep reaching farther.
